price: 69. Yeemene maray Ni-sabbatah Yallih naqboytiitiiy, nafsiiy, sheetanal yingicillee, diggah Ni-gitittel tirri ken heenno, kaadu diggah Yalli meqe mará luk yan catóo kee dacayrih.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ جَٰهَدُواْ فِينَا لَنَهۡدِيَنَّهُمۡ سُبُلَنَاۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَمَعَ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna jāhadū fīnā lanahdiyannahum subulanā wa-inna al-laha lamaʿa al-muḥ'sinīna
